trans-unit.target: REACH!<tab>FAIL!
You sense something larger than even a great takitaro!<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.
You sense something massive just below the surface!<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.
The water falls dark...<tab>A faint glow returns to the water.
A golden figure lurks near the surface!<tab>The golden figure has retreated to the murky depths.
Something large has risen from the depths to feed!<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.
You sense something even more terrible than Canavan in the waters before you!<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.
You sense a new legend might be told this day...<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.
It smells of a rat...<tab>The stench has abated.
You sense something deep beneath the magma...<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.
Something glimmers near the river bed...<tab>You no longer perceive anything out of the ordinary.
You sense the lord of these skies has returned...<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.
Lady Luck has sidled up beside you...<tab>The good lady has departed.
Something wondrous this way comes...<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.
The lake begins to radiate with the colors of the rainbow!<tab>The glow fades...
The stones beneath the water begin shifting hither and thither.<tab>The stones are stationary once again.
A massive shadow slides across the loch floor.<tab>The shadow is no more.
You see the flickering light of eyes beneath the waters.<tab>The flickering light fades...
You sense eyes staring up at you from the sandy waters...<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.
A glimmering jade figure drifts beneath the waters.<tab>The glimmer fades into the depths.
A large shadow dances along the loch floor.<tab>The shadow is no more.
The visage of a gormless-looking Roegadyn stares at you from beneath the waters.<tab>The face vanishes back into the depths.
The ocean begins to twinkle like the stars in the sky.<tab>The twinkle fades to nothing.
A shadow evoking the Lord of the Whorl slithers across the ocean.<tab>The shadow has disappeared.
The coral begins to wriggle about on the ocean floor.<tab>The wriggling stops.
You see a metallic glint just beneath the waters.<tab>The glint vanishes.
A massive boulder begins to writhe on the ocean floor.<tab>The boulder ceases to move.
You spot a glimmer of crimson, as if a ruby has floated to the surface of the ocean.<tab>All hint of crimson vanishes.
The shadow lurking under the surface belongs to a beast spoken of only in legend.<tab>The shadow is no more.
An aura of violent menace rises from the depths!<tab>The sense of menace dissipates.
You glimpse the writhing silhouette of some vast tentacle moving just beneath the water.<tab>The undulating shadow has withdrawn.
You glance down into a pair of astoundingly goblin-like eyes.<tab>You no longer feel the weight of that goblin-like gaze.
You rub your eyes, certain you'd seen a creature with no business being out on the ocean.<tab>The out-of-place creature has moved on...or never was.
A graceful, leafy form appears, swirling and dancing beneath the waves.<tab>The leafy form has swept on out of sight.
A dull cracking and crunching sound echoes up from the sea floor.<tab>The crunching, cracking sounds fade into silence.
A reptilian tail writhes and splashes up to the surface!<tab>The splashing subsides.
The Font's aquatic flora undulates with sudden activity! <tab>The activity subsides...
A massive, ship-shaped silhouette darkens the waters before you.<tab>The shadowy silhouette returns to the depths.
A layer of ice suddenly forms upon the lake's surface!<tab>The frozen surface thaws.
A profound melancholy swells within you!<tab>The melancholy passes as swiftly as it came...
A large fin breaches the ocean surface!<tab>The fin sinks under the surface and out of sight...
A lethal predator draws close to the ship!<tab>The predator loses interest...
A strip of red and white floats under the water's surface!<tab>You lose sight of the colorful fish...
Something blue glitters deep under the water!<tab>The glittering vanishes...
You feel hungry eyes track your every move!<tab>The hungry thing decides to feast elsewhere...
The sea temperature rises suddenly!<tab>The temperature of the water returns to normal...
The seaweed glimmers with a strange light!<tab>The seaweed glimmers no more...
The scent of plums rises from the waters!<tab>The scent of plums disappears...
You spot a massive shadow drifting along beneath the clouds.<tab>The shadow is no more.
You glimpse the blurred form of some flying creature as it flashes across the sky.<tab>Like a living bolt of lightning, the creature flickers past and is gone.
